segments.text: Bobby ! Come here , look what I got you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A chess board ! Daddy is going to teach you how to play !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , each player gets 16 pieces . You can be the white ones and I ’ ll play with the black pieces . Now in the front , you set up the pawns . Those are the least valuable pieces and can only move one space forward . When you are about to capture another piece , it can move one space diagonally .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about all these other pieces ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See this one that looks like a tower ? It ’ s called the rook . The one with the tall hat is called the bishop . See this little horsey ? This is called the knight , it ’ s a very important piece so it ’ s best to not let your opponent capture it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And these two ? They are husband and wife ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right ! That ’ s the queen and that ’ s the king . If the other player captures your king , he will say ” Check Mate ” and the game is over ! Doesn ’ t this sound fun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nah ! This is boring ! I ’ m gonna go play Killer Zombies on my PlayStation !
segments.speaker: S2
